task_description:
# GPU Reservation System

Allow users to reserve GPU capacity in advance for guaranteed availability. Commit to usage for discounted rates. Addresses Lambda Labs availability issues.

## Rationale
Addresses Lambda Labs pain point of limited availability. Enables predictable capacity for production workloads. Premium feature for enterprise customers.

## User Stories
- As a production ML team, I want to reserve GPUs so that I have guaranteed capacity for model training
- As a startup, I want reservation discounts so that I can plan my budget with certainty

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Reserve GPU types for specific time windows
- [ ] Reservation discounts (10-20% off spot pricing)
- [ ] Guaranteed availability SLA for reservations
- [ ] Reservation calendar and management UI
- [ ] Unused reservation credits roll over 30 days
